mapper.select:
select tc.sellcarcount sellcarcount, tc.carvolume carvolume, tc.visitorsum visitorsum, tc.purchasesum purchasesum, (select count(tc.carstatus) from t_car tc) cangkucount, (select count(tc.visitcarstatu) from t_car tc where tc.visitcarstatu = 1) visitcount, (select count(tc.expocarstatu) from t_car tc where tc.expocarstatu = 1) expocarcount, (select count(tc.placecarstatu) from t_car tc where tc.placecarstatu = 1) placecarcount, (select count(tc.mentcarstatu) from t_car tc where tc.mentcarstatu = 1) mentcarcount
from t_car tc
